input.sentences: this was the band first public performance .
they were a little nervous but the tried not to let the crowd see .
they opened up with a song full of heavy guitar rifts .
as the started to get into the music they completed forgot about the crowd .
it was a great first show | but they were very tired afterwards .
output.sentences: Tonight was the night the band was finally going to play on stage.
They had been practicing tirelessly  for weeks.
The guitar solo was the part of the show they were most excited about.
The audience appeared to be having a great time!
Unfortunately, they could not be more wrong and were greeted back stage with notes from the owner of the venue to never play there again.
